kese wethath pawathi ayahapath kalaguna thaththwaya matha krushikarmika anshaye aarthika katayuthu samasthayak washayen wartha kara aththe siyayata 3.2 ka sruna wardhanayaki. 2016 palamu karthuwata sapekshawa 2017 palamu karthuwe di pradhana krushikarmika aarthika katayuthu athurin “wana waga saha dawa”, “saththwa nishpadana” , “kulubadu waga kirima” saha “karadiya dhiwara katayuthu” yana ansha piliwelin siyayata 9.3k, siyayata 6.9 k, siyayata 6.1 k saha siyayata 5.8 k yanadi washayen salakiya yuthu wardhana wegayan wartha kara atha.
mema maranaya sambandha mahesthrath parikshanaya saha pashchath marana parikshanaya katharagama rohaledi eeye (21) pawathwimata niyamithawa thibuni.
kesewethath mema bhu kampanayen thapa widuli balaya nipadawana sthanayakata hani wimen miliyana thunakata aasanna pirisakata widuli balaya nathi wiya.

unge hakupada godak prathyasthayi.

alpitiya, uuragasmanhandiya  pradeshaye wayasa awurudu hatharaka dariyakata barapathala lingika apayojanaya kirime siddhiyakata sambandha sakakaruweku eeye (20) athadanguwata gena thibenawa.uuragasmanhandiya polisiya wisin mema athadanguwata ganima sidukara athi bawayi wartha wanne.sakakaru 56 hawiridi dedaru piyek wana athara ohu rathnapura pradeshaye dewalayak pawathwagena yana kapu mahatheku bawayi thorathuru anawaranaya wi aththe.sakakaruge niwasa aasannaye pihiti asalwasi niwasaka padinchiwa siti adala dariya awastha kihipayakadi sakakaru wisin apayojanaya kara athi bawa sandahan.siddhiyata sambandhayen lada paminillakata anuwa sakakaru athadanguwata ganima sandaha polisiyata sarasena awasthawe ohu pradeshayen palagos thibenawa.anathuruwa polisiyata labunu thorathuru matha sakakaru athadanguwata ganimata polis kandayam kihipayak meheyumak diyath karamin sitiyadi nithignyayeku margayen sakakara pudgalaya polisiyata bharawi athi bawayi wartha wanne.siddhiyata muhuna pa dariya rohal gathakara athi athara sakakaru adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithawa thibu bawayi apa warthakaru sandahan kale.
